name: JavaCommandsManager
short_description:
JavaCommandsManager is a commands manager, written in Java.
JavaCommandsManager works with jre 1.6 or jre 1.7.

Please consider donating to my paypal account: dsfbstudent@yahoo.com.br

Please consider sending bug(s) or suggestion(s) to my email: dsfbstudent@yahoo.com.br
summary: JavaCommandsManager is a commands manager, written in Java.
